title: How to Make a Mii Look Like a Robber

steps.headline: Change your Mii's favourite colour to black.
Change your Mii to short and skinny.
Change your Mii's face to round (if not already).
Change your Mii's skin colour to yellow and put some pink blush on them.
In hair, put a black beanie on your Mii.
You can give your Mii any type of eyebrows, as long as they look sleek and maintained.
In eyes, change your Mii's eye colour to black and once again, give them any type of eyes.
Your Mii's nose should be triangle.
Give your Mii a simple smiling black mouth.
In accessories give your Mii big black glasses and a black mustache.
steps.description: Place the mustache just under the Mii's nose.

steps.headline: Voila!
steps.description: Your Mii is now a robber.

text: Change your Mii's favourite colour to black.  Choose a gender. (it doesn't matter which) Change your Mii to short and skinny.  Change your Mii's face to round (if not already).  Change your Mii's skin colour to yellow and put some pink blush on them.  In hair, put a black beanie on your Mii.  You can give your Mii any type of eyebrows, as long as they look sleek and maintained.  In eyes, change your Mii's eye colour to black and once again, give them any type of eyes.  Your Mii's nose should be triangle.  Give your Mii a simple smiling black mouth.  In accessories give your Mii big black glasses and a black mustache. Place the mustache just under the Mii's nose. Voila! Your Mii is now a robber.
